items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 100% recommend!
items.body: Super comfortable and warm, which is a huge bonus since I’m anemic and get cold easy but this comfy sweater does the trick! Perfect length and very durable. True to fit on the sizing. Love the style and design of it! Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice cozy sweater
items.body: Love this sweater! It is so cozy and fits very nice. True to size and the color is true. It’s warm and hangs nice. I wish I could report that the quality is very good, but sadly it already has a hole after 3 wears. I still like it and wear it. Read more
items.author: Brittany Kata

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater is priced right if you want something that will become a seasonal favourite.
items.body: I love the LILLUSORY Womens Oversized Chunky Sweater! The weave is perfect for keeping you warm but allows it to drape for a comfortable fit. The fabric's quality ensures that the colour won't fade after several washings on the gentle cycle and the classic style will keep this in your fall/winter rotation for several years to come. I ordered size small and the sleeves are perfect for my long arms, but it is really big on me so if you want something that's not quite as oversized, try ordering a size down. At the current price point of $29.99 (October 2025) this sweater is priced right if you want something that will become a seasonal favourite. I definitely recommend this sweater. Read more
items.author: Ordinary Complex

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fall sweater
items.body: Nice warm and comfy oversized sweater. I wore this to work and it kept me warm and wasn’t too much when I was having hot flashes mid day lol it was perfect for a chilly fall morning and light enough for a warm sunny fall afternoon. I am 5'2 165lbs. I ordered my normal size medium and it was still oversized as pictured. I've washed it a couple of time and it has still maintained its soft feel. Read more
items.author: PrettyWinnie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick, warm shirt
items.body: This shirt was given to my daughter. She used it as part of a cosplay for what turned out to be a rather chilly Halloween this year. She said it was very thick and kept her warm all night trick or treating with friends! It was also soft and very comfortable. Would recommned! Read more
items.author: Dev

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really wide with very tall neck
items.body: There is a reason that the models have their hands on their hips in all the photos in the ad, it's to try to make this really wide and unflattering sweater look better. While the sweater is soft, the quality is nice, and it is well made, It just doesn't look good on me. I have a really long neck and the turtleneck on this sweater hits me in the chin. If you have a shorter neck, this sweater would either cover your face or be bulky and uncomfortable. The ad calls it an "oversized chunky sweater", I would agree it is definitely oversized (in the width) and, unfortunately, makes me look chunky. Gave it 4 stars since it is soft and nice quality and someone else might like the way it fits on their body. Read more
items.author: SBshopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buttery soft
items.body: The most buttery soft turtleneck! It’s extremely cozy and feels so rich! All it needs is a nice steam. Would highly recommend- I will look into more color options for myself. The small details provide texture and flare to an already basic turtleneck which is a nice touch. Ordered the brown which is such a BEAUTIFUL color & adding more of this color to my closet- it’s such an underrated unused color option. Thickness is great, provides warmth but overbearing. Good length and quality craftsmanship. I ordered an XL, I’m size 12, 5’7 for Reference. My Impression & Rating: 5 Stars: On Repeat – Love it. High-impact, worth the space and spend. 4 Stars: Strong Add – Great value or design—no second thoughts. 3 Stars: Think It Through – Has appeal, but depends on your needs. 2 Stars: Needs Work – Some redeeming qualities, but not without effort. 1 Star: Skip It – Doesn’t live up to the promise. Read more
items.author: AOliv

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and comfy. Not as “chunky” as suggested.
items.body: Fabric feels like its good quality, and is quite soft. But it is not “chunky” as suggested in the description. It is a nicely woven fabric but only about a the thickness of a light hoodie or fleece. But the collar is nice and long, so you have kind of a built in scarf. And the fabric is generous in only the right places to be fashionably loose/cozy. Not really long term cold weather gear due to the thickness. but it does look nice after tumble drying. -It comes vacuum packed in a plastic bag, so the fabric is considerably compressed and holds onto some wrinkles and creases after unpacking. Read more
items.author: Novanoon

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Apricot, Black, Chocolate Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
